thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 65 of 7163
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
the website is wonderfully laid out with all options clearly put forth. 10/10 website designing. The products match the service, and excellent care is used when shipping products which is a real priority for me or anyone else that doesn't live on the east coast and knows there package will be handled by multiple trucks/planes/people. the only thing that doesn't please me is there prices are ALMOST COMPETITIVE. Like really close. it's just most other websites have items a little cheaper, but the ease of transaction and the clarity of order are worth the small price increase.
overall 9.5/10
